author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Employees Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) has appealed to staff of private schools, colleges, hospitals, hotels and restaurants to divulge information to check if their establishments were working in compliance with the Employees’ Provident Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions Act.

The appeal is meant to help employees to get enrolled and, if not, to make the organisations comply with the Act. Persons willing to provide such information could contact the Regional PF Commissioner-I in person on any working day.
title: EPFO appeal to employees
